description:
The Breeze is the most beloved Vasque boot of the last two decades. we’ve gone back to the classic design principles that made the original Breeze a boot that hiked all over the world. We’ve taken the best elements that each former Breeze has provided – modernized the design approach, and introduced sustainable, durable materials at every turn to deliver a modern adaptation of a classic boot that has defined a generation of outdoor exploration.

The Breeze is the first style to debut VasqueDry®, which promises to deliver trusted waterproofing and is derived from 25% recycled materials. Tried and true, this boot has been relentlessly tested throughout its development to ensure it is packed with the comfort and durability that many have come to rely on from the Breeze.
name: Vasque Breeze, Medium - Mens
